title: League of legends is no longer playable for me.
body: BECAUSE OF FUCKING LOW PRIORITY QUEUE!

replies.body: k but my tasks making me afk

Then why start a game?

Play when you know you're going to have full free time.

> [{quoted}](name=LeagueZhen,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=yWE3TL0T,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-07-10T09:37:30.485+0000)
>
> k but my tasks making me afk

If you can't set enough time aside to play, don't play.

Don't play if you have tasks (job? chores?)

Do that first then play.
It's probably not a good idea to play while you have less than 45 minutes without interruptions.
